attributes.review: This app gave me chlamydia, made me go into debt, spent the rest of my retirement fund, ate my dog, contaminated my water supply, infested my shed with termites, poisoned my taxidermy rat, blew up my car, burned down my house and killed off my family. Needless to say this app is CURSED and the Trump administration is full of witches who hexed this supposedly helpful app. 0/10.
attributes.title: Worst app to ever exist

attributes.review: Don’t download! Immediately once opening the app asks for your phone number which I find very inappropriate. Why does it need my phone number? I can steal my information and use it against me. It is stealing data from innocent US people. 🧚🏽✨🎊
attributes.title: It’s not worth it

attributes.review: So I was trying to make an edit of Anonymous 🥵🥵😳 bc ofc their so hot and I kept on getting notifications from this app but I was trying to ignore it bc ya know ANONYMOUS 🤤😍😏 but they would not stop so I had to STOP my edit and go to this HORRIBLE APP‼️‼️ 😡 and it gave my phone a VIRUS and it took me AN HOUR to stop it 😭😤😤 I hate this app ‼️ 🤢🤢🤮 DONT DOWNLOAD IT 😡
attributes.title: Worst app Everrr 😤

attributes.review: Crashes every time I open it and now my screen keeps flickering. Why would they allow this on the AppStore? I think it spread to my computer too, it’s screen is now flickering as well. Wish I could give 0 stars. DONT DOWNLOAD!!!!!
attributes.title: Kept crashing. Think it gave me a virus

attributes.review: This app could have been tremendous, people, and I’m not saying it isn’t, but people tell me, they say, have you looked at this app? And I say no, and they say, oh, it’s not that great, you’re really not missing anything, and I don’t think it’s a great app but it could have been really great, really great.
attributes.title: YUGE FAIL

attributes.review: i suggest you do not get this app for your own good. it’s sent me over 50 notifications within the last 20 minutes and is taking over my phone. now there are a ton of pictures in my camera roll of a cheeto president and when i touch them it leaves cheeto dust on my fingers. now the song foreigner keeps playing on blast and it won’t stop. this cheeto man is trying to take away tik tok which gives kids a safe space. he needs to delete this app and rethink his next spray tan.
attributes.title: foreigner 🏳️‍🌈

attributes.review: I got this app and it immediately started crashing. My phone even started getting slower and I noticed my brain getting slower too-almost like my IQ was dropping. I would strongly recommend getting rid of this app, it is dangerous.
attributes.title: This app is slow

attributes.review: I opened the app & saw a monster while I was holding my niece & it scared her which caused her to cry which meant I had to stop her from crying which took an hour definitely would not recommend & PSA if you vote for this dirtbag there’s a special please in hell waiting for you-Don🐐👑
attributes.title: Sorry Not Sorry

attributes.review: Why on earth would the president of the USA (someone we were taught that fights for the people) have “help us fight against social democrats” the first thing when you open this app. I understand the people feeling the need to disagree and have different options but the prez??? AnyBODY But Trump 2020🤗🇺🇸
attributes.title: Ok but actually

attributes.review: I hated the app. It didn’t even operate correctly. It wouldn’t let me press a single button on that app. All it did was glitch out of the app. I’m definitely sure it is not because of my wifi connection nor my device. I trust that this app is not good to use.
attributes.title: HORRIBLE
